[ti:Leave Me Alone]
[ar:NF]
[al:The Search]

[00:00.00]Leave Me Alone - NF
[00:04.45]Lyrics by：Nate Feuerstein/Tommee Profitt/Cole Walowac
[00:08.90]Composed by：Nate Feuerstein/Tommee Profitt/Cole Walowac
[00:13.35]Hey
[00:14.73]Leave me alone
[00:15.22]Leave me alone leave me alone
[00:16.38]Panic-stricken handle business not a joke yeah
[00:19.13]Manners missin' travel different no control yeah
[00:22.07]Time to listen time to zip it keep it closed
[00:24.99]My description highly gifted take some notes yeah
[00:27.55]Lack of interest why'd you visit
[00:29.79]Hit the road yeah
[00:30.93]I'm kinda twisted so keep your distance be a ghost
[00:33.43]Yeah see I'm inventive but quite the menace you ain't know
[00:36.35]Well then I'm offended let's jog your memories here we go yeah
[00:39.78]I went from nobody to kinda famous
[00:42.39]Hide my plaques inside the closet I just can't explain it
[00:45.29]My wife she tells me that she's proud and thinks
[00:46.93]That I should hang 'em
[00:48.09]But I just leave 'em on the ground right next to my self-hatred
[00:50.86]Yeah yeah mental health where's my mental health
[00:53.38]Diagnosed with OCD what does that mean
[00:55.66]Well gather 'round
[00:56.41]That means I obsessively obsess on things I think about
[00:59.49]That means I might take a normal thought and think it's so profound
[01:02.17]Leave me alone
[01:03.14]Ruminating filled balloons are full of doubts
[01:05.31]Do the same things if I don't I'm overwhelmed
[01:07.82]Leave me alone
[01:08.59]Thoughts are pacing they go 'round and 'round and 'round
[01:11.26]It's so draining let's move onto something else fine
[01:14.25]Oh
[01:14.41]Leave me alone
[01:14.88]I'm in the game but they don't even know it
[01:16.31]Like I'm undercover and don't want to blow it
[01:17.53]I come out of nowhere they don't even notice
[01:18.77]The flow is so cold you would think it was snowin'
[01:20.44]Oh
[01:20.59]Leave me alone
[01:21.06]I'm under the weather but wind isn't blowin'
[01:22.30]I got an umbrella for difficult moments
[01:23.30]You got to admit it I'm very devoted
[01:24.51]I'm out in the ring but they don't always help me so I
[01:26.64]I I
[01:27.24]Hold up my balloons and cover up my face
[01:29.43]Face
[01:30.28]I can feel them weighin' on me every day
[01:32.25]OK
[01:33.25]I should let 'em go and watch 'em float away -way
[01:35.49]Float away
[01:36.22]But I'm scared if I do then I'll be more afraid
[01:38.23]More afraid
[01:39.21]Tell them how I feel but they don't want to change
[01:41.30]Don't want to change
[01:42.21]Tell them how I feel but they remain the same
[01:44.16]Same
[01:45.03]Loosen up my grip they say that's not okay
[01:47.24]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy leave me alone
[01:50.19]Oh
[01:50.38]Leave me alone
[01:52.12]Ayy yeah
[01:53.32]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy
[01:55.25]Yeah leave me alone
[01:56.00]Leave me alone
[01:58.09]Woo yeah
[01:59.41]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy
[02:01.11]Yeah leave me alone
[02:02.17]Leave me alone
[02:02.78]I hate when they debate if we're underrated
[02:04.94]We're so overlooked that they're lookin' over our numbers
[02:07.53]Nathan
[02:07.71]Leave me alone
[02:08.25]We don't do enough interviews or go out in public lately
[02:10.61]We don't post enough on our socials
[02:12.49]To keep the buzz from fading
[02:13.75]Leave me alone
[02:14.31]Let it fade yeah let it fade
[02:15.82]Once it's decimated then you drop a song outta nowhere
[02:18.45]And all the fans embrace it
[02:19.79]Leave me alone
[02:20.26]Then the buzz will surface again it's part of my operation
[02:22.72]I don't need advice from my doubts right now
[02:24.75]End of conversation
[02:25.30]Leave me alone
[02:25.76]Shut your mouth yeah shut your mouth
[02:27.48]Better tone it down close it now
[02:29.36]If you make a sound I'ma change your dial
[02:31.11]Leave me alone
[02:31.74]Funny how they be acting loud comin' on it now
[02:34.43]It's floating 'round
[02:35.28]Man the kid is wild pretty wild true
[02:36.79]Leave me alone
[02:37.43]I'm kinda phony but don't really show it
[02:38.75]I keep it together but have a disorder
[02:40.36]I go to my room and I sit in my corner
[02:42.00]And talk to myself in a language that's foreign
[02:43.48]Leave me alone
[02:43.93]I think of a rhyme and I have to record it
[02:45.41]But know if I don't I'll wake up in the mornin'
[02:46.92]And question my life again always avoiding
[02:47.97]I hate to be different but hate to be normal so I
[02:49.76]I I
[02:50.18]Leave me alone
[02:50.66]Hold up my balloons and cover up my face
[02:52.38]Face face face
[02:53.34]I can feel them weighin' on me every day
[02:55.26]Oh
[02:56.20]I should let 'em go and watch 'em float away
[02:58.12]Float away
[02:59.17]But I'm scared if I do then I'll be more afraid
[03:02.14]Tell them how I feel but they don't want to change
[03:04.23]Want to change
[03:05.06]Tell them how I feel but they remain the same
[03:07.14]Remain the same
[03:07.94]Loosen up my grip they say that's not okay
[03:10.26]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy leave me alone
[03:13.01]Leave me alone leave me alone
[03:15.06]Ayy yeah
[03:16.45]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy
[03:18.37]Yeah leave me alone
[03:19.20]Leave me alone leave me alone
[03:20.67]Woo yeah
[03:22.41]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy
[03:24.16]Yeah leave me alone
[03:24.94]Leave me alone
[03:25.75]Remember back in no name
[03:26.76]I said fame called
[03:27.86]Yeah yeah
[03:28.53]Told you I hung up it kinda felt wrong
[03:30.60]Leave me alone
[03:31.13]Wrong wrong
[03:31.71]Finally called him back we didn't talk long
[03:33.89]No
[03:34.24]He asked me how I'd been I sent him this song
[03:36.59]Leave me alone
[03:37.03]Quiet quiet quiet
[03:37.53]Yeah think he took offense he kinda seemed off
[03:39.75]Off
[03:40.16]I texted him that night to ask what he thought
[03:42.45]Leave me alone
[03:42.98]Quiet quiet quiet
[03:43.42]It took a couple days to get a response
[03:46.29]But once I finally did he said this song sucks
[03:48.32]Leave me alone
[03:48.45]Quiet quiet quiet
[03:48.58]Feel the symptoms couldn't miss 'em wrestle with 'em
[03:51.10]Then I pin and flip 'em brought some back up
[03:53.30]No well you should get some some
[03:54.80]Who you dissin'
[03:55.60]Mood is switchin' don't come in the kitchen
[03:57.38]You should listen cookin' records for my hands are blisterin'
[04:00.28]So persistent don't forget this hold the tension soul is bendin'
[04:03.33]No pretendin' open ended low percentage so demented
[04:05.83]Leave me alone
[04:06.31]Whole consensus flow tremendous no apprentice d**e incentive
[04:09.26]Show intensive so possessive tone aggressive watch your step when I I I
[04:12.92]Leave me alone
[04:13.36]Hold up my balloons and cover up my face
[04:15.54]Up my face
[04:16.12]I can feel them weighin' on me every day
[04:18.17]Yeah every day
[04:18.95]I should let 'em go and watch them float away
[04:21.22]Yeah float away
[04:21.92]But I'm scared if I do then I'll be more afraid
[04:23.88]More afraid
[04:24.34]Leave me alone yeah leave me alone yeah
[04:26.26]Yeah yeah yeah
[04:27.34]Leave me alone leave me alone
[04:29.05]Yeah yeah yeah
[04:30.12]Leave me alone leave me alone
[04:32.04]Yeah leave me alone
[04:33.04]Leave me alone leave me alone ayy leave me alone
[04:36.14]Leave me alone leave me alone
[04:37.85]Ayy yeah
[04:39.35]Quiet quiet quiet quiet quiet ayy
[04:41.21]Yeah leave me alone
[04:42.15]Leave me alone leave me alone
[04:43.98]Woo yeah

[04:47.08]Yeah leave me alone
[04:48.16]Leave me alone leave me alone
[04:49.95]Ayy yeah

[04:52.91]Yeah leave me alone
[04:54.06]Leave me alone leave me alone

[04:59.07]Leave me alone leave me alone leave me alone

data.trans:
[ti:Leave Me Alone]
[ar:NF]
[al:The Search]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.45]//
[00:08.90]//
[00:13.35]//
[00:14.73]别烦我
[00:15.22]别烦我 别烦我
[00:16.38]闻风丧胆 独揽大权 我没有开玩笑
[00:19.13]行为放纵不羁 四处旅行 不受约束
[00:22.07]都给我好好听着 闭上嘴巴 别说话
[00:24.99]我才高八斗 学富五车 都好好学着点
[00:27.55]既然没兴趣 那你为什么要来
[00:29.79]赶紧滚蛋
[00:30.93]我脾气不好 你最好离我远点 别出声
[00:33.43]我别出心裁 却是个定时炸弹 你不知道吗
[00:36.35]我不高兴了 让我来唤醒你的记忆 开始吧
[00:39.78]我从无名小卒混成了明星
[00:42.39]把我的奖牌藏在衣橱里 我也说不清是为什么
[00:45.29]妻子对我说 她为我骄傲
[00:46.93]她觉得我应该把奖牌都挂起来
[00:48.09]但我根本不把它们当回事
[00:50.86]心理健康 我的心理出了什么问题
[00:53.38]医生诊断为强迫症 这是什么病
[00:55.66]都过来
[00:56.41]这意味着我思考事情的时候会特别纠结
[00:59.49]这意味着我可能会把一件简单的事情想得特别复杂
[01:02.17]别烦我
[01:03.14]苦思冥想 压力山大 充满疑虑
[01:05.31]每天做着同样的事情 一旦停下 便不知所措
[01:07.82]别烦我
[01:08.59]许多想法在我脑子里盘旋 来来回回
[01:11.26]让我疲惫不堪 还是换个开心的话题吧
[01:14.25]//
[01:14.41]别烦我
[01:14.88]我已经入行了 但他们还不知道
[01:16.31]我像间谍一样低调行事 不想搞得人尽皆知
[01:17.53]我突然冒出来 很多人根本没有注意到
[01:18.77]我的说唱风格冷漠 没有人情味
[01:20.44]//
[01:20.59]别烦我
[01:21.06]我身体有些不适 但今天没有风
[01:22.30]在艰难的日子里 有人为我遮风挡雨
[01:23.30]你必须承认 我很专注
[01:24.51]面对危险 他们不肯帮我 所以我
[01:26.64]我
[01:27.24]拿起气球 遮住我的脸
[01:29.43]脸
[01:30.28]我随时都能感受到压力的存在
[01:32.25]好吧
[01:33.25]我应该放手 看着气球飘走
[01:35.49]飘走
[01:36.22]但我害怕如果我这样做了 我会更加不安
[01:38.23]更加不安
[01:39.21]把我的感受告诉别人 但他们无动于衷
[01:41.30]无动于衷
[01:42.21]把我的感受告诉别人 但他们无动于衷
[01:44.16]无动于衷
[01:45.03]松开我的拳头 他们说这样不行
[01:47.24]安静点  别烦我
[01:50.19]//
[01:50.38]别烦我
[01:52.12]//
[01:53.32]安静点 
[01:55.25]别烦我
[01:56.00]别烦我
[01:58.09]//
[01:59.41]安静点 
[02:01.11]别烦我
[02:02.17]别烦我
[02:02.78]我讨厌别人在背地里议论我们是不是被人看扁了
[02:04.94]我们太渺小了 所以他们都不会关注我们
[02:07.53]//
[02:07.71]别烦我
[02:08.25]我们没有接受什么采访 也很少出现在公众场合
[02:10.61]我们很少在社交网站上发布动态
[02:12.49]以此保持热度 防止被大家遗忘
[02:13.75]别烦我
[02:14.31]就这样低调一点吧
[02:15.82]等大家都忘了我时 再突然发行一首歌
[02:18.45]粉丝们一定会喜欢的
[02:19.79]别烦我
[02:20.26]我的热度又上来了 这是我的营销策略
[02:22.72]我不需要你们用怀疑的心态给我提建议
[02:24.75]通话结束
[02:25.30]别烦我
[02:25.76]闭上你的嘴巴 闭上你的嘴巴 
[02:27.48]最好降低音量 立刻闭嘴
[02:29.36]你要是敢发出声音 我就打给别人
[02:31.11]别烦我
[02:31.74]看他们现在这么张狂 真搞笑
[02:34.43]声音传遍各地
[02:35.28]朋友 这个小伙很疯狂 真的
[02:36.79]别烦我
[02:37.43]我有些虚伪 但不会表现出来
[02:38.75]我想理清思绪 却越来越乱
[02:40.36]我回到房间 坐在角落里
[02:42.00]用外语和自己对话
[02:43.48]别烦我
[02:43.93]我想到一段旋律 必须把它记录下来
[02:45.41]要是现在不记 一觉醒来就是第二天早上了
[02:46.92]再次质疑自己的人生 总是喜欢逃避
[02:47.97]我讨厌与众不同 但我又不想默默不闻
[02:49.76]我
[02:50.18]别烦我
[02:50.66]拿起气球 遮住我的脸
[02:52.38]脸 脸 脸
[02:53.34]我随时都能感受到压力的存在
[02:55.26]//
[02:56.20]我应该放手 看着气球飘走
[02:58.12]飘走
[02:59.17]但我害怕如果我这样做了 我会更加不安
[03:02.14]把我的感受告诉别人 但他们无动于衷
[03:04.23]无动于衷
[03:05.06]把我的感受告诉别人 但他们无动于衷
[03:07.14]无动于衷
[03:07.94]松开我的拳头 他们说这样不行
[03:10.26]安静点  别烦我
[03:13.01]别烦我 别烦我
[03:15.06]//
[03:16.45]安静点 
[03:18.37]别烦我
[03:19.20]别烦我 别烦我
[03:20.67]//
[03:22.41]安静点 
[03:24.16]别烦我
[03:24.94]别烦我
[03:25.75]还记得在单曲《NO NAME》里
[03:26.76]我把名气称为什么吗
[03:27.86]//
[03:28.53]跟你说我要挂电话了 感觉有点不对劲
[03:30.60]别烦我
[03:31.13]不对劲
[03:31.71]最后还是给他回了电话 我们没聊多久
[03:33.89]不
[03:34.24]我问我最近如何 我把这首歌发给了他
[03:36.59]别烦我
[03:37.03]安静点
[03:37.53]我觉得他生气了 脸色看起来不太好
[03:39.75]不太好
[03:40.16]那天晚上我给他发了短信 问他有什么想法
[03:42.45]别烦我
[03:42.98]安静点
[03:43.42]他过了好几天才回复我
[03:46.29]好不容易盼到他的回复 他却说这首歌很烂
[03:48.32]别烦我
[03:48.45]安静点
[03:48.58]感受这种病症 不想错失分毫 和它对抗到底
[03:51.10]将它玩弄于手掌之中 
[03:53.30]你也应该试试
[03:54.80]你在骂谁
[03:55.60]翻脸比翻书还快 不要进厨房
[03:57.38]你应该好好听听这首歌 为了创作我呕心沥血
[04:00.28]所以记住 一定要坚持 保持紧迫感 你的灵魂被出卖了
[04:03.33]从不装模作样 开放包容 百里挑一 行为疯狂
[04:05.83]别烦我
[04:06.31]得到一致好评 作品出众 成熟老练 亢奋不停
[04:09.26]演出感染力十足 人格魅力强大 语气霸气十足 当心脚下
[04:12.92]别烦我
[04:13.36]拿起气球 遮住我的脸
[04:15.54]遮住我的脸
[04:16.12]我随时都能感受到压力的存在
[04:18.17]每天
[04:18.95]我应该放手 看着气球飘走
[04:21.22]飘走
[04:21.92]但我害怕如果我这样做了 我会更加不安
[04:23.88]更加不安
[04:24.34]别烦我 别烦我
[04:26.26]//
[04:27.34]别烦我 别烦我
[04:29.05]//
